The video in question was published on F: 2019, and has been viewed more than 75,000 times and shared more than 2,100 times.
The caption accompanying the video: written in a mix of traditional and simplified Chinese characters, translates to English as: "[Train] American rioters don't want to miss out, set fire to a subway train!"
A reverse image search on Google reveale: Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile, and not in the US as claimed.
Chilean media outlets: including Primera Fuenta, reported on the blaze at Elisa Correa station and a subway car in Puento Alto, corroborating the authenticity of the video.
